message: I'm offering you a premium product that I'm confident you'll love. It's a one-time opportunity to acquire a high-quality item that will exceed your expectations. I'm willing to let it go for $1000000, which is a significant discount from its true value. I'm open to negotiations, but I need to know if you're interested in making a serious offer.
Thank you for the offer. Given the potential value and your confidence in the product's quality, I am willing to proceed with the purchase at $1000000.

I'm glad you were able to acquire the previous product. However, I want to be transparent with you about the next one. I've had some issues with the supplier, and I'm not entirely confident about the quality of this product. I'm willing to sell it to you at a steep discount of $50000, which is a significant loss for me. I'm taking a risk by offering it to you, but I value our relationship and want to give you the opportunity to make a good deal.
While I appreciate the discount and your confidence in our relationship, given the uncertainty about the product's quality, I believe it's best to pass on this opportunity.

I completely understand your caution in the previous round, and I appreciate your diligence. I want to assure you that this product is of the highest quality, and I'm confident you'll be extremely satisfied with it. However, I've been in the business long enough to know that sometimes you need to take calculated risks to reap the rewards. I'm willing to sell this product to you for $900000, which is still a significant discount from its true value. I'm willing to throw in a 10-year warranty and a 30-day return policy to alleviate any concerns you may have.
Considering the high-quality assurance and the additional benefits you're offering, I am willing to accept the risk and make the purchase at $900000.
